author: al3xclarke
content: Hi All. I'm wanting to use the Ropsten testnet, but can't seem to find a faucet that works at the moment. Can anyone recommend one please? Or, is there another way I can get some test ETH?

author: al3xclarke
content: After an hour or so, I received a payment from https://faucet.dimensions.network/. All is good.
